DOC.brief_summary: Six identical female twin age 9-13 year participate . One sib twin pair give Cervarix accord 0 , 1 , 6 month vaccination scheme , sib give Gardasil accord 0 , 2 , 6 month vaccination scheme . Three blood sample take ( first prior vaccine administration , second third 7 day dose 2 3 , respectively ) . The blood sample use determine : 1 ) magnitude anti-HPV 16 anti-HPV-18 antibody response , 2 ) well cross-reactive pattern response towards relate , non-vaccine HPV strain ( HPV-31 -33 , HPV-45 ) . 3 ) plasmablast isolate blood take 7 day 3rd dose first place ( eventually 2nd dose also ) examine usage VDJ VJ segment immunoglobulin heavy ( VH ) light ( VL ) heavy light chain . Gene useg B cell induce Cervarix Gardasil compare . Finally cross-reactive potential monoclonal antibody obtain eukaryotic expression series heavy ( VH ) light ( VL ) chain single ASC isolate 3rd dose three-dose schedule either Cervarix Gardasil examine . The duration study approximately 187 day . Five study visit take place , time period 6.5 month , follow telephone call 12 month . The purpose study learn molecular mechanism underlie cross-neutralizing capacity AS04-adjuvanted HPV vaccine ( Cervarix速 ) comparison aluminiumhydroxyphosphate sulphate adjuvanted HPV vaccine ( Gardasil速 ) .
DOC.brief_title: Study Molecular Mechanisms Underlying Cross-neutralizing Capacity AS04-adjuvanted HPV Vaccine ( Cervarix速 ) Comparison With Aluminiumhydroxyphosphate Sulphate Adjuvanted HPV Vaccine ( Gardasil速 )
